programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy'S Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep59

programme.desc: B.O.B'S Big Break - B.O.B. and his monstrous crew are on a mission to bust out of the government's top-secret holding cell.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep3
programme.desc: Brothers - When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo's treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress… who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo – but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo – but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep13
programme.desc: Star - Dulcinea finds a wishing star and decides to use it to help San Lorenzo, but all of her wishes wind up in chaos.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep14
programme.desc: Pigs - Toby's ninja brother Brandt returns to San Lorenzo, and Puss agrees to help him reunite with his brothers – to get them out of town.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep15
programme.desc: Luck - A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep16
programme.desc: Dragon - Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep22
programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house – or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep24
programme.desc: Sphere - A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep25
programme.desc: Si - Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep26

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep10
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip'S Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary - When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Duke Time / Harpy Stubbs - An exhausted Duke Detain takes his first day off after an uncharacteristic mistake on duty. // An unlikely friendship develops between Poppy Starr, the world's biggest pop star, and Harl Hubbs, the city's humble, helpful handyman.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Hawk Man / Jammy Good! - Parker meets Mt. Middlemost's resident daredevil, who hung up his "cape" after an extreme jump went wrong. // Ms. Pam creates a sentient jar of jam who wins the hearts and minds of all who dine at the Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Dave's Pavilion - When the Chipmunks accidently ruin Dave's new pavilion, they allow Miss Miller to take the fall.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep503
programme.desc: U-Fly - Alvin's too short to ride an exhilarating new amusement park ride, so he devises a plan to sneak on afterhours.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep426
programme.desc: A Very Merry Chipmas - Theodore is mistaken for an elf and whisked off to the north pole to help build toys in Santa's workshop.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Chapa's Crush - When Danger Force fails a mission because Chapa is distracted by a crush, the gang has to track down her obsession and get their friend back to her normal self.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Age of Evolution Pt. 2 - With the birth of three new Terrans (hashtag, Nightshade, and Jawbreaker), the Malto family has grown. But will these new allies be enough to rescue Dot and Megatron from the clutches of Mandroid?

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep110
programme.desc: A Moral Star, Part 2 - When their plan goes awry, the crew must improvise. Meanwhile, Gwyn discovers a dark truth that will forever jeopardize their quest toward salvation.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Loudest Yard / Raw Deal - When Lincoln’s mom signs him up for peewee football, Lincoln schemes to have Lynn take his spot. // After Lucy reads Lincoln’s fortune and claims his day will “end in disaster”, Lincoln becomes a hypochondriac.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Go Nate, It's Your Birthday - To remedy Nate's subpar birthday celebrations, Martin lets Nate borrow his credit card with rules that may have been "open to interpretation". After a day of limitless fun, Nate and his friends must pay off their debt.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep130
programme.desc: Greasy Buffoons / Model Sponge - Mr. Krabs and Plankton woo customers with greasy entrees. // SpongeBob tries a career at being a model in a kitchen sponge commercial.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep106
programme.desc: A Life In A Day / Sun Bleached - Everyone is in awe of Larry the Lobster's daredevil ways, especially SpongeBob and Patrick. // Everybody who's anybody is going to a big party in Bikini Bottom, but you have to be a certain shade of tan to get in.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Dolores Moody / P.I.R.A.T.E. - Parker tries to cheer up the grouchiest woman on Mt. Middlemost-Dolores Moody. // Parker, Angus, and Russell must save the S.S. Steadfast from being taken by pirates.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Diss the Cook / For Sale by Loner - Lincoln is convinced the middle school lunch lady is holding a grudge against him and his older sisters. // Mr. Grouse attempts to find some peace and quiet after moving away from the Louds.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Fright Bite / The Loudly Bones - When a vampire moves into Royal Woods, Lucy must convince him to turn the Mortician's Club into vampires. // Lisa discovers that the dinosaur bones she found in her backyard may not be what they seem.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Navidad Special - Ronnie Anne is excited for the perfect Christmas, but visits from the neighbors put her dream Nochebuena on hold!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Hawk Man / Jammy Good! - Parker meets Mt. Middlemost's resident daredevil, who hung up his "cape" after an extreme jump went wrong. // Ms. Pam creates a sentient jar of jam who wins the hearts and minds of all who dine at the Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Box Smusher / Tie-Dye Eye - When multiple packages are found smushed, the Middlemost Post must discover the truth and clear their name. // Parker wakes up one morning with Tie-Dye Eye, and pretty soon, so does the entire mountain.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep175
programme.desc: It's a SpongeBob Christmas! - SpongeBob inadvertently helps Plankton enact his plot to put all of Bikini Bottom on Santa’s “naughty” list, and now has to stop Plankton before he gets his Christmas wish—the Krabby Patty secret formula!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep135
programme.desc: Back to the Past / The Bad Guy Club for Villains - SpongeBob and Patrick go back in time to see the young Mermaidman and Barnacleboy. // SpongeBob and Patrick watch their heroes fight bad guys in a classic Mermaidman and Barnacleboy episode.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep136
programme.desc: A Day Without Tears / Summer Job - Squidward bets SpongeBob he can't go a day without crying. // Mrs. Puff has to work through her summer break at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep137
programme.desc: One Coarse Meal / Gary In Love - Mr. Krabs finds out that Plankton's afraid of whales. // Gary falls for a snail named Mary.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Scorpion's Sting - When Tigress discovers she's ill, Po and Monkey set out to obtain the only known cure, which is protected by the evil Scorpion.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Sticky Situation - After Po accidentally destroys the training hall, he seeks the help of the creator, Taotie, only to discover he's no longer a friend of kung fu... but an enemy!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Library - A professor leads the kids to a spirit library in the middle of the desert, where Sokka hopes to discover powerful secrets to use against the Fire Nation.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Right Hand Man - The lemur habitat acquires a new resident. King Julien loves to order around his new attentive servant, but Mort is suspicious.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Operation: Antarctica - After Private saves a Leopard Seal from being turned into fish chum, Private agrees to help her get back to Antarctica. Skipper, Rico, Kowalski & stowaway King Julian must follow him and rescue him before he becomes seal chow.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep238
programme.desc: Nighty Night Ninja / Siege the Day - Watching too many ninja movies has brainwashed Leonard the koala. When he sleeps, he terrorizes everyone by sleepfighting. // Private is left to babysit four adorable ducklings as the rest of the gang tries to crash a monster truck rally.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Love Loaf / Beach Day... of Horror - SwaySway and Buhdeuce sneak into a "girls only" summer camp in order to find the one and only Jenny Quackles. // The guys head to the beach and nothing is gonna ruin their day, not even a big scary M-M-M-M-MONSTER

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker, Make Me A Map - In need of a unique custom map for their next quest, Brendar and the group attempt to wine and dine the only map maker in Gothmoria capable of creating the map they need.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Dorg and the Coolnado / Dorg Writes a Paper - Jet thinks he's losing his cool, so he casts a spell and ends up an ice-cold villain! It's on Dorg and the gang to warm Jet's heart and save Normill! // The gang resurrects town founder Bertram Bumberback to help Dorg write a paper!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Little Monster / The Great Mighty Mythic Marathon - Timmy asks Felicity and Miguel to babysit his nephew. // All of Mythlandia competes for the ultimate prize.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Fart Baby / Kung-Fu Catapult - Sanjay and Craig are the proud parents of a baby fart. // Sanjay and Craig agree to rid Tufflips' trailer of ghosts in return for a catapult.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Release the Hound / Cube is the Loneliest Number - Bernie pleads with Ollie and Cleo to let him keep a gross doglike monster they are intending to pack. // When Ashlor traps Ollie, Bernie, Cleo and Wowski, Ollie figures out how to escape to the Dark Cube.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep104
